kiwi.ui
Class KFileChooser

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JFileChooser
                  kiwi.ui.KFileChooser
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
public class KFileChooser
extends javax.swing.JFileChooser

A direct replacement for JFileChooser that supports background texturing. All methods behave equivalently to the superclass, with the exception of getSelectedFile(), which now returns null if the Cancel button was pressed.


An example KFileChooser.

Since:
Kiwi 1.4
Author:
Mark Lindner
See Also:
kiwi.ui.dialog.KFileChooserDialog, Serialized Form
